text: malhala ulineun hananim-eul midgo uliege gyesidoen geosgwa abeu lahamgwa iseuma-elgwa isaggwa yagobgwa geuligo geu jasondeul-ege gyesidoen geos gwa mosewa yesuga gyesi bad-eun geosgwa seonjijadeul-i geudeul-ui junim-eulobuteo gyesibad-eun geos-eul midnaida ulineun geudeul eoneu nugudo seonbyeolchi aniha myeo ojig geubun-egeman sunjonghal ttaleum ila
